segments.text: Get up , it's time for you to get ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me just get five more minutes of sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would , but you need to start getting ready for school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand , but all I want is five more minutes of sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I let you go back to sleep , I know that you won't get up in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Trust me . I'm going to wake up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a lot to get done this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I already know , and I'll take care of all that when I wake up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want you to be on time for school today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll make it to school on time . Don't worry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll let you sleep for a little while longer .
segments.speaker: S1
